abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would be part of
            the National Irrigation Program. Its main objectives are:
            (a) to increase agricultural production in the drought-prone
            area of the Brazilian Northeast, through the development of
            irrigation; and (b) to strengthen institutional arrangements
            for irrigation development by promoting increased farmer
            involvement through the creation of private irrigation
            districts and by improving public agency performance. The
            project would finance: (a) the construction of six public
            irrigation schemes in three Northeastern States; (b) the
            initial operation of private irrigation districts; and (c)
            the provision of technical assistance to the executing agencies.
